channel.title: Truck – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Fire Truck Driving Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes.On PCWASD or Arrow keys = driveTap the right button = change to the water gunSwipe the screen with the mouse = switch the cameraOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen
item.content:encoded:
Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes.
On PCWASD or Arrow keys = driveTap the right button = change to the water gunSwipe the screen with the mouse = switch the cameraOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen

item.title: Extreme Road Trip
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Extreme Road Trip is a 2D cartoon vehicle game. After completing the beginner guidance, you will know how to control the vehicle and develop your garage. It is time to enjoy all challenges and levels for your records. Even the 2D platform will test your driving skills and balance abilities!On PCA or Left arrow = […]
item.content:encoded:
Extreme Road Trip is a 2D cartoon vehicle game. After completing the beginner guidance, you will know how to control the vehicle and develop your garage. It is time to enjoy all challenges and levels for your records. Even the 2D platform will test your driving skills and balance abilities!
On PCA or Left arrow = brakeD or Right arrow = gasOn MobileTap on the 2 buttons on the screen

item.title: Animal Transporter Truck
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Animal Transporter Truck is a simulation game. It allows you to transport animals as a truck driver. Your mission is to reach the destination within a limited time. When you are lost, follow the green arrows on the street to guide the correct directions.On PCWASD or Arrow keys = moveOn MobileTap buttons on the screen
item.content:encoded:
Animal Transporter Truck is a simulation game. It allows you to transport animals as a truck driver. Your mission is to reach the destination within a limited time. When you are lost, follow the green arrows on the street to guide the correct directions.
On PCWASD or Arrow keys = moveOn MobileTap buttons on the screen
